Package scene.tuio

Interface Summary
SceneTuioListener The SceneTuioListener interface extends the TuioListener inteface, and provides a simple callback infrastructure which is used by the SceneTuioClient class to dispatch TUIO and Scene events to all registered instances of classes that implement the interface.
 

Class Summary
Scene The Processing wrapper class for the Scene Java Library.
SceneBlob The SceneBlob class encapsulates Scene blobs.
SceneTuioBlob The SceneTuioBlob class encapsulates /tuio/2Dblb TUIO blobs.
SceneTuioClient The SceneTuioClient class is the central TUIO protocol decoder component.
